1131311221.content:
"Theres a farm behind the wall that belongs to friends of the free folk. I say we make our way down there for some rest and supper... and a nice warm place to be alone for a night." Ygritte suggests to Jon.

"Ygritte I think your forgetting something? Why in the seven hells have you done this to me?! How?!"

"Oh relax Jon Snow. You know I'd never hurt you... well unless you gave me a good reason too." Ygritte joked.
"I just called in a favor an old Speardic priest owes me, and a few days later he had this foul smelling mix of herbs and gods know what else. I knew there was no way you would drink something like that since your so used to your fancy wine. So i just mixed it into the goats milk you drank last night."

Jon was astounded by this information. He had no idea magic like this ever existed let alone survive the ages to this day.

"But... why? Will I ever get back to normal?"

Ygritte looked down at her little lover on the cold ground. She sat down, crossed her legs and scoooed him up in her hand. Bringing him close up to jer face.

"Do you trust me Jon? Do you trust that I love you and I will protect you?"

Jon didnt know what to say. He thought he could trust Ygritte, and he knew he loved her, but what possible reason could there be for shrinking him? Wasnt the North dangerous enough?

"Ygritte... just tell me why and then I'll answer that."
1131311221.title: Nothing?

11313112212.content:
"Its not permanent. I had the priest teach me how to grow you back. Its easy and I can do it anytime. But its too dangerous for you to be seen right now Jon. You were a crow so some of us want to kill you. You are now part of the free folk so the crows want to kill you. There are white walkers, wolves, bears and so many things out there that can kill you. But now that you're small, I can protect you. Nobody knows about this, not even Tormund... or that rapist priest...not anymore anyways."

Jon felt like kissing Ygritte and holding her close, but if course he was a little small for that. He knew Ygritte wouldnt betray him. He knew she had to have a good reason to do this, no matter how unfair it was.

"You dont need to protect me Ygritte. I can handle myself."

"Not against free folk who really want you dead. If they ever got to talking amongst themselves and decided they dont want you around anymore, the only people that would protect you would have been me and Tormund. Jon this is just until I know you are safe. It wont be long I promise."

Jon sighs then speaks.

"Alright. I trust you."

Ygritte smiles down at Jon, and Jon smiles back. While the winds from atop the wall blows in their hair.

"Well then... I say its time to get moving, dont you little snow flake?", Ygritte giggles.

"Please dont call me that."

Ygritte giggles again, then raises Jon up to the collar of her fur coat, allowing him to step onto the furry outline of her hood. Jon snuggles himself in and Ygritte starts to walk down the stairs of the Nightfort 700 feet down to the ground, occasionally taking breaks along the way. Ygritte exits the castle with Jon and they begin their journey to the farm in the south.

115332221.content:
Hot Pie's hands squeezed the soft douge. His mind drifted of into a day-dream as he worked his way through the soft flesh, folding and rolling it over the flour.

Yes, life at the kneeling king was truely wonderful. With food, a warm place to sleep, and bread to roll all day Hot Pie was at his happiest.

Though the war still raged on, the inn still saw quite a few customers coming along, but the where mainly just the Brothers without banners.

It did come to Hot Pie as a shock when he found out that he was basickly part of a rebelion force, but as long as they didn't causs him any trouble he was happy.

"Boy," a harse women's shout came from outside the kitchen. "Are you done with those bread rolls? A swear I'll beat you if it's not." Hot Pie groaned before replieing,"I'm almost done."

That was one of the few things Hot Pie dispised anbout the inn. That bloody women would annoy him so often and even clot him with a wooden spoon. It made him so angry some times that he wished he fled with Arya.

But thinking about it was just plain folly. Why would he give up his life here at inn to go with Arya galloping in the woods? No, he licked it here. Though he disliked the women, the innkeeper was a different story.He was much more friendlier, talketive, and felt somewhat like a father to Hot Pie.

Bending down to place the rolls in the oven, Hot Pie felt how his breeches strained. For the last month, Hot Pie had experienced strange growth spurts. "Your growing like a weed," the Women ones told him. "Either that, or your getting fat."

That could be the reason, but if it was so, then why was the innkeep experiencing the same problem. "You blasted women. You shrunk my clothing in the wash again," he bellowed one morning, coming shirtless down stairs. The Women only snorted. "I guess your also getting as fat as that boy in the kitchen," she said, pionting towards his round beer-gut. He cursed her and went upstairs again.

But these days it seemed that all his clothes where too tight in him, but Hot Pie couldn't worry about that today. He had to go with the innkeep hunting somewhere close to midday.
115332221.title: A growing boy.

1153322211.content:
It was somewhere in the midday houers when Hot Pie and the innkeeper went hunting. They rode to garrosons that was recently bought from a few passing strangers. They needed a boat and the skiff at the back was perfect.

But Hot Pie would have rather walked then ride. He could still remember the days fleeing Herrenhal, when the sores between his legs felt like fire-ants bitting him. "Ag, why do we have to go hunting? Can't Lem and the others do it?" Hot Pie complained.

The innkeep gave him a sharp glance, saying,"Lem and the others are escorting Arya. It's up to us to fetch some ge." Hot Pie mumbled under his breath, tugging on his tight breeches.

To ignore his discomfort, he stared out on the road ahead. It was then, for some reason, that Hot Pie noticed that his garron seemed smaller. 'I'm just imagening things,' he told himself.

His eyes drifted towards the innkeep. He too was having some discomfort with his clothing, seemin...taller as well. The came to the spot where a reasonable amount of game was. Dismounting, Hot Pie felt his feet touch the ground erlyer then it should.

"Time to hunt, boy," the innkeep declared. He hauled down a cocked crossbow and headed out into the field. Hot Pie followed him, ajusting his breeches it will sit more comfortably. He walked behind the innkeep, his walking pace faster then usual.

The spotted a rabbit in the field. The innkeep was about to loose an arrow, but suddenly he began to grow.
1153322211.title: Skip to midday.

1153322222212.content:
Sam was lost. Horribly lost. If that wasn't bad enough, he was alone too, separated from the group following the attack on the Fist. Cold gripped him through his layers of clothing and armor, chilling him to the bone.

"Mother, have mercy," Sam whined, not for the first time. The horse he rode was blown, wasted by the long ride and Sam's weight. He knew that the poor animal would die soon, and that he would have to walk the rest of the way...that is if he could find his way.

'I should just give myself to the Others,' he thought. Snow started to plummet from the sky, and the air became colder and colder. Winds began to blow hard, letting Sam's cape snap.

There was a snowstorm approaching, Sam observed. 'I'm going to die out here.' He didn't care; he was tired. Dieing would be sweet relief.

Just as all hope seemed lost, Sam spotted cave between the trees. It would provide some protection from the cold, at least. He spurred the horse towards the cave.

It was still cold inside, but a little warmer then outside. The world outside became whiter and whiter as the storm was settling in, carrying a eerie howling noise.

Sam dismounted and went to lay somewhere in a corner, perhaps waiting to perish. His eyes drifted around. It was more of a long underground passageway then a cave. It went on and on, disappearing into the oblivion.

A sudden urge to explore overwhelmed Sam, and he found himself searching the bags on his horse. 'What am I doing?' he asked himself as he was lighting a torch. 'O, what does it matter? I should do at least something brave in my life before I die."

He grabbed the horse by his spurres, and led him down the cave.

But what does he find?
1153322222212.title: During his time fleeing back to the wall.

11533222222121.content:
Sam walked down the cave, pulling the horse with him. The torch lit the way, but reducing the world to a small world of black rock for Sam. He felt nervous-er with each step he took. Sam half expected a bear or some sort of monster to come charging at him, but that never happened.

Instead, Sam was met with eerie silence and darkness, until he spotted a little green light far at the end of the tunnel. He approached it, the light growing bigger and brighter.

He came to a halt in front of a large entrance. Carefully, Sam walked inside. The room was cylinder-shaped, vast in size. Sam stared at awe around him, not quit believing what he saw. It was lit by large green crystals,making Sam's torch completely unnecessary.

In the middle of the room Sam spotted a large steaming pool. It wasn't very deep, and he could feel the welcoming warmth coming from his.

Out of some strange curiosity, Sam wanted to plunge in. He undressed himself, taking off his layers of thick clothes, boots, breeches, and even his small clothes. Sam was being bombarded by the cold as he stood there as naked as his name day. For ones, Sam thanked his blubber for keeping him warm long enough.

He quickly climbed in, the water burning his skin slightly. Sam dipped his head under the water, and started washing his face when he broke the surface.

Sam soaked himself in the pool, the troubles he faced not bothering him the slightest. Hell, he didn't even care that his cock has gone stiff as a rock, his ball tensing tight.

He sighed, running his hand over his hard manhood.

What happens next?
11533222222121.title: A hot spring.

(This story happens sometime during the second season while Daenerys and her people are in Qarth)

Daenerys Targaryan, the mother of dragons, was exploring one of the many markets in Qarth. She wasn't looking to buy much, if anything at all, she just wanted to get some time for herself and see the local culture. She was wandering by herself, despite Jorah's wishes for her to stay in her quarters. But she insisted to him that she needed some time alone to think and that she wouldn't be long and he reluctantly agreed.

It wasn't long before Daenerys found herself being heckled by a desperate merchant who begged her to buy some of his wares. Being polite she decided to humor the old man instead of just ignoring him. He told her that he had recently received some magic potions that she would be very interested in. Believing him to be a fraud Daenerys told him that she wasn't interested and she began walking away. That's when the old man grabbed her hand and handed her a tiny little bottle. He explained to her that what was in this three inch bottle was a very dangerous potion and that if she were ever in trouble she only need to pour its contents on any would-be assailants. Daenerys tried to refuse taking the bottle but the old man told her it was his gift to her and that if she liked the results to return for more.

After that she continued to wander the city until felt she had seen enough. Daenerys then retired to her room in Xaro's mansion for the night. Late that same night she lay awake in her bed thinking of all that had happened to her and things she had done. And how it all lead her to where she is now. She then thought about the events of earlier that day and she remembered the mysterious bottle she was given. Sitting up, she reached for the mysterious bottle that was just behind her on the bedframe. Unfortunately after she thought she got hold of it, the bottle slipped out of her hands and flew into the air causing most of the liquid to spill out onto Daenerys. Suddenly she felt very weak and she fell off her bed and onto the floor where she passed out.

When she woke up Daenerys found herself in an unfamiliar place. Her head was aching somewhat but she tried to ignore it. She then felt a cool breeze come across her body and that was when she noticed that she was completely nude. Which caused her to quickly snap out of her tired state and collect herself. She tried to get a bearing on where she was and find some clothes as well. The room was very large and just in front of herself she could see an incredibly large door, she briefly wondered how anyone could ever open such a monolithic structure. But it was when she saw what was behind her that shook her to her core. Her now empty robes and the mysterious bottle, both gigantic in size. Upon seeing this Daenerys realized what was going on, she was still in her room, only she had been reduced to an incredibly tiny size!

Once the initial shock of being shrunken had settled, Daenerys realized that whatever was in that mysterious bottle must have done this to her. She ran her hands along her smooth body, not caring what the insects beneath her saw. She felt tiny, ever dwindling bodies brush against her feet as they expanded in size. She wiggled her toes, feeling tiny people getting caught between and under them, most popping like grapes from the pressure. The little people were pushed along by her feet as she felt her feet reach the crowds. As she grew, she could feel a few people being knocked through the air to the top of her feet by the seismic disturbance and chaos she was causing. Most of the now ant sized people were simply overtaken by her feet, crushed beneath them. Her feet had completely filled the square and were pressing against the buildings that surrounded it. She felt brief resistance and discomfort before increasing the speed at which she grew, causing her feet to plow through the stone buildings. Her feet expanded so that entire neighborhoods and business districts surrounding the square were mowed down beneath her.

***

The people in the square looked up in terror as the queen loomed over them, her massive form blotting out the sun. She raised her hand, and waived her fingers at them.
“GOOD BYE.” Her voice echoed through the square. She then took a deep breath, causing her impressive chest to swell out even further, before closing her eyes and leaning her head back towards the sky.

People in the crowd murmured amongst themselves, concerned about what was going to happen. Was she going to leave them alone? Was that why she said good bye?

They felt a low rumbling in the street beneath them, unsure what it was. The ones nearest her saw it first. The remaining bricks in the street where she stood began to crumble as her feet slowly began to expand. A thunderous moan filled the air above them as her growth exploded.

Her feet seemed to spread out in every direction, casting up rubble and dust as the crowd tried to flee but was quickly overtaken. The first few on the edge of the crowd were hit from behind by the wall of flesh. They were pushed along a little ways until the feet were so tall that they actually began slipping under the curvature of the edge of her feet. They were soon crushed by the massive shifting weight of their queen’s dainty little feet.

Her toes had reached the crowd by this point. The people ran as fast as they could in vain. Some looked back to see the massive toes towering above them. The tiny ridges in her toes that would have been imperceptible at normal size now looked large enough to climb like rungs on a ladder. Her toes broke through the crowd, mowing down people in their path. The toes began to rise into the air before crashing down at random times. Dozens were crushed or swept between her toes. None realized that this horrible act was done without malice and was in fact merely Cersei wiggling her toes at the sensation of feeling the people brush up against them. The toes crashing down sealed the fate for more than just those beneath them. The force and constant drumming of them was enough to cause many in the fleeing crowd to trip and fall, only to be crushed by the ever expanding feet. Her feet struck the buildings surrounding the square, which offered little resistance before being crushed as well.

Cersei felt her growth slow to a stop. She let out the breath that she did not realize she had been holding and opened her eyes. At her feet lay a dust cloud of ruble and destruction, all that remained of the section of the city she destroyed. She looked ahead and saw that the Red Keep, the seat of power for all of Westeros, barely came to her genitalia in height. She was truly massive. The mere sight of the capitol beneath her made her nethers to moisten with anticipation, causing massive drops of cum to crash down below her causing more damage and destruction than a boulder hurled from a catapult. She looked down at the tiny city beneath her feet and felt an all too familiar grin creep across her lips.

What does she do?

Cersei levelled her eye at the young woman in the glass and smiled. "Don't go anywhere now, I still have to check on the rest of our dinner guests, and I may need your services again if I get a bit peckish ha ha."

Cersei then stood back up and looked over the seemingly empty banquet hall. She let out a relaxed sigh and pulled the hem of her dress up slightly so she could see better around her feet. "Well, I'd better take a walk around the room to see how the rest of my dinner guests are faring!"

Cersei started around the right side of the table, slowly walking around the piles of clothes scattered around the floor. She had different plans for them. No, Cersei was only concerned with those on the floor, they're the ones who could possibly escape, and that she couldn't allow.

She grinned evilly and licked her lips as she quickly snatched up the coat, revealing a small man who was tangled underneath. He was fat, ugly, old and from the expression on his face very confused and scared. Perfect.

"Mmmmm it feels even better than last time with that little whore." Twisting her foot on the remains she continued on to the next pile of clothes.

Some she squished slowly under the toe of her boot, their limbs flailing wildly and their screams turning into gurgles as their organs were violently ejected from their mouths. She laughed and giggled as she mercilessly exterminated her guests, the sounds of their demise beneath her feet were music to her ears. "Ahhh, a queen could get used to this!" First, she walked over to the table and picked up a large bowl, emptying out the bread that was in it. With the guards sorted out she grabbed a large silver tray and once again made her rounds around the table, this time collecting the remaining lords and ladies from the chairs. She snatched them up one by one and plopped them onto the tray, ignoring their screams and sounds of confusion. Once she had retrieved all of them she was ready to begin. She placed the tray on the table in front of her seat and began to sit down, however something she saw caught her eye.

Looking down onto her tiny shivering form filled Cersei with lust and power like she had never felt before this day. "Did you think I had forgotten about you my dear?" She asked the whimpering woman. "I believe this party is coming to an end, but there is one more thing I need you to do my servant. I need a cushion for my chair." She looked up to see the Queen Regent hiking up the back of her dress, exposing her silken undergarments that so wonderfully and tightly hugged the curves of her royal rear.

It didn't take much longer till she came, letting out a loud, long moan that left her slumped and shuddering in her seat. "Well boys I think it's time that I get going, and I would love to crush you all out like the bugs you are, but you feel sooo good under my soles, I want to keep you! What's a girl to do? She then did the same with the other half of guards for the other boot. Then with both her shoes filled with the shrunken men she gleefully said, "I've decided to keep you all as my insoles! That way I can still feel your little bodies under my feet, AND eventually, squish you all into paste. Isn't that a great idea?" Cersei then let out a cruel laugh and began to slid her beautiful white stocking clad feet into her shoes. Most of the smart guards immediately ran to the toe of her boots as her feet entered, but one or two of the slower ones found themselves squarely under her heel or the pad of her foot, once they had settled. As she stood up from her seat those unfortunate men directly under her feet were splattered, their blood and organs spilling out into the rest of her boots, much to the horror of the remaining guards. Cersei however was loving it, letting out a loud moan and wiggling her toes in her shoes as she felt a warm liquid sensation soak her feet. "Mmmmm I think shrunken men insoles is gonna become a staple of my wardrobe, you little boys just feel too good under me. Well, let's head up to my bedroom shall we? The rest of you, try not to get squished right away okay?" She then let out another cruel laugh and walked out of the dining hall.

On her way back to her quarters Cersei met with her secret advisor and personal maester, Qyburn, who was responsible for creating her shrinking potions. She arranged with him to have the dining hall cleaned and the whole ordeal covered up, including the missing house guards. She also ordered him to synthesize more of the potion for future uses. She had big and upcoming plans for her kingdom and it's pathetic people. She then continued her walk to her quarters, deciding to take the long scenic route, relishing in every step, feeling the guards pressed under her soles. By the time she reached her bedroom and slipped off her heels, the only thing remaining were bits of bone and viscera that were stuck to the bottoms of her stockings. She masturbated vigorously that night, almost screaming out in ecstasy as she touched herself to the sight of her soiled stockings and shoes. She later dreamed towering over Kings Landing, ruling all of Westeros as an unstoppable giant goddess. Cersei slept very well that night indeed.

As Jon Snow called after her Ygritte couldn’t help but smirk. People always underestimated her, thought that she wasn’t smart or capable. Because she was young. Because she was a woman. Because she was pretty. But she paid attention, she planned ahead and, most important of all, she remembered. She’d seen the way the other women in the camp had been eyeing up the lost crow, measuring him up and finding him far from wanting. In fact if there was any wanting it was on their part… as in wanting his nice South-of-the-wall-cock to fill their snatches. Jon didn’t see this though, as he didn’t yet understand the way of the Free Folk. They took what they wanted so if a stronger, more capable woman was able to take Jon from her there would be nothing she could do about it other than fight back. That was how things worked.

If you wanted to keep someone for your own you had to find a way to make him or her linked to you forever. For most that meant a baby. Get a belly big and taunt and you were together forever… or at least until something better came along. By Ygritte wasn’t ready for a child, not yet. She still wanted to have fun with her lost little crow and a big belly would only get between the two of them… both figurative and literally. So she’d thought of new plans, different ways to ensure that Jon Snow not only remained her’s but would never think about leaving her, either for another woman or his precious Night’s Watch.

It had been two days earlier, as they had passed a field of large boulders with one that was shaped like a foot that Ygritte suddenly had her answer. She’d remembered a story from her childhood that Tigna, the old soothsayer in her tribe, had told her.

People thought that giants were another race of people, as different from a man as a dog was from a deer. But Old Tigna claimed that giants had started off as normal people, the same as everyone else. She said that there existed a hidden pool, buried underground, where the warm enchanted waters would transform anyone who swam in them into a giant. Ygritte had been fascinated by giants when she’d been little and begged Old Tigna to learn more until she’d finally told her the sights she’d have to look for if she wished to find the cave. She’d also given her a warning:

“Growth of the body doesn’t mean growth of the mind. If one does not know what the pool does they will grow but forget their lives, believing themselves to have always been giants. Only by knowing the truth can one keep their memories.”

When Ygritte had seen the boulder shaped like a foot she’d realized she’d seen the second marker on the path to the caves. For the next few days she’d kept her eye out, at times fearful that Mance had turned them the wrong way and that they were leaving the path only for her to spot the next marker and relief to fill her. And now, finally, she’d come to the cave itself, the mouth hidden by snow and rocks. She’d only seen it because she was looking for it and as she rushed deeper underground, Jon Snow calling out for her to come back, she felt her heart thudding in her chest. She went down a long shallow ramp and then came to a stop, staring at awe at the large glowing blue pool that sat before her. A waterfall fell down from an opening in the stony wall and steam rose in the cool air. Ygritte looked to her right and saw a bundle of old rotting clothing and then to her left where, just beside the pool, she saw in the wet dirt a foot print that was nearly three times the size of her own. Giants had been here, many years ago… and they hadn’t started off that big.

The legend was real. And she was here.

“Ygritte!” Jon called, finally catching up to her. He looked at the pool, amazed, and Ygritte grinned as she turned around and stared at him.

“I’ve been thinking, Jon Snow. You have so many vows. To your crows. To Mance. To your family. You can have all of them…” she began to yank her clothing off, tossing them away without a care; she wasn’t going to need them anymore. Giants could easily survive the cold of the North and only wore clothing because humans got so flustered around their naked bodies otherwise. She removed the last of her garments and stood before Jon, the cool air and the warm steam making her feel flush… and the thought of what was about to happen making her heart race and her body tense and ready. “…or you can have me.”

She could see it in his eyes: he wanted her. The Crows could make as many vows and oaths as they wanted but a man was a man and there was nothing one could do to stop a man from being just that. And Jon Snow was a man… her man… soon to be forever.

She slowly began to step back, a coy smile on her face, and she mentally cheered as he began to remove his own clothing, setting them aside in a hurry but with a bit more care than Ygritte. She wanted to tell him he wouldn’t be leaving with those garments but that thought made her stop and wonder… should she tell him? On one hand she wanted him to come to her of his own will, to accept all that was about to happen. On the other hand… if he didn’t know he would forever forget his vows, of his life in the South. She would be able to make him however she wished, without fear that one day he’d feel regret. They’d be giants and Jon would believe they’d always been giants. No risk of his morals of values getting in the way. She’d make him as she wanted him to be and reap the wonderous rewards.

“Jon…” she said.

James Kalstark blinked his eyes as he struggled to regain his vision. The entire camp had been blinded. It must have been some sort of Lannister trick. He cleared his eyes to see his squire passed out on the floor of his tent. The squire was a fat boy and James rushed to his side to right him on his feet.
“Lord Kalstark, what happened?” The squire asked nervously.
“I’m not sure, it must have been a ploy by the Lannister’s,” James replied, stroking his bearded chin. “Alert the rest of the troops. An attack may be eminent. We must prepare to march on the Lannisters!”
The squire nodded and rushed out of the tent. “Sir! You should have a look at this!”
James rushed out of the tent to see that the entire landscape had changed. What was once a thick forest blanketed by night, was now replaced with a warmly, if dimly, lit strange alien landscape. The ground was a light tan, solid terrain instead of the dense underbrush they had struggled to clear when they made camp. The tall pine trees of the forest were replaced with some sort of strange thick, red trees that seemed to snake up into the sky. They were massive and the forest went on as far as the eye could see. The air was humid and had a thick, somewhat familiar, musky scent. Perhaps they were near a bog, James mused.
The Stark men were all staring at their surroundings in shock and awe. James knelt down and touched the ground. It was almost pliable, and warm to the touch. The ground suddenly rumbled violently beneath them, causing men to scream in fear as they lost their footing and their gear and supplies to collapse to the ground. When the shaking stopped, James pulled himself to his feet. Where were they?
“I don’t know what the Lannister’s did, but this must be some sort of trick,” he said, helping his squire to his feet. “ Rouse the officers. We march on the Lannister’s.”
While the Starks and Lannister’s marched on each other, neither army realized they were being observed by a higher power.

Dany nodded at that, finding it rather odd to be introducing herself to a pair of naked lesbians while towering over King’s Landing but she decided to move past that. “I have returned to the Seven Kingdoms to reclaim my throne. None shall stand in my way-“

“Hmmm, makes sense,” Margaery stated, slowly standing up and stretching, giving Dany an eyeful of her lush and curvy body. “Sansa and I already declared ourselves queens of these lands yesterday but there is nothing to say you couldn’t join us.”

“J-join you?” Dany said, startled by these turn of events.

“What do you think, Sansa?” Margaery asked, helping her young lover up. The red head looked Dany over and licked her lips; her recent show of power with Margaery had unlocked something primal and her and she felt braver than she ever had before.

“Oh yes… I’ve always wanted to ride a dragon.”

“S-see here…” Dany stammered as the nude couple walked up to her, lightly brushing Dany’s dragon’s away before they began to run their hands along her body, tugging at her clothing. “If this is… some kind of trick…”

“No trick,” Margaery whispered, nibbling on Dany’s ear. “Look at us. We are the largest, most powering beings in the world. Why shouldn’t we do what we please? You want to rule… you will rule. Join us and we can rule together as goddesses of the Seven Kingdoms.”

Sansa nodded, boldly reaching around Dany and kneeding her breasts through her top, causing her to moan. “You just need to let go of your silly little insecurities. Starting with hiding your body.” She tugged and Dany’s top, trying to free her breasts. “Strip down… remove your clothes. You’ll never need them again. Join us.”

“Destroy your clothing and join us as the third goddess of Westeros,” Margaery said, rubbing her crotch against Dany’s leg.

12522111121111211.title: She grows as big as the others

12522111122.content:
Sansa's face was still flushed in the aftermath of her passionate kiss with the enormous Margaery, and she took a moment to assess her new situation. "Fun", her friend said. Fun. Sansa hadn't had anything resembling fun in the past two years, since the Lannisters took her prisoner. But now, she was gigantic. Holding out her hand, she realized that her fingertips spanned longer than the wings of the legendary Targareyn dragons of old. She was a mountain of power. The thought made her blood run hot.

Her hand closed into a fist. Since her imprisonment, she could count on that same hand the number of people who had shown her kindness. The Hound. Littlefinger. The Queen of Thorns. Her forced husband, Tyrion the Imp. And her equally-titanic friend Margaery. But the Hound had fled. Littlefinger had gone to claim Harren Hall. With Margaery a giant beside her, that left exactly two people in King's Landing whose lives she cared to spare.

But the rest? Even apart from the Lannisters and their forces, the common people of this city had earned her hatred. They cheered her father's execution. Arya had never been found, and had no doubt been murdered or worse by some random thug in the streets. Sansa herself would have been raped and mutilated by these savages if the Hound hadn't intervened.

There was no mercy in Sansa's heart for anyone in this city. She was of the North. The North remembered. The North was cold. Vengeance was cold.

For the first time in two years, her lips broke into a true smile. "Margaery, my dearest friend," she whispered, sliding her hand in the small of the other giantess's back. "This wretched place won't be able to survive the fun we're going to have."

125321.content:
Sansa stood at the door to her sisters room awaiting a reply from inside.

"Arya?"

She knocked again and waited for an answer. Upon hearing nothing, Sansa tried the handle and opened the door, peaking inside before opening it fully and stepping into the room.

"Arya? Are you here?"

Sansa could have sworn she say Arya walk walk down the hall and enter her room a minute ago. But for all Sansa knew she could be using her strange new skills to pull a prank and scare her. Sansa hadnt gotten to know this new "hardened assassin" version of her little sister, but she never knew Arya as one to pass up an oppurtunity to embarrass her.

For now, Sansa would play along. She hadn't seen Arya for far to long since their days with their father in the south and she wanted nothing more than to value their time together. That is atleast... until she spotted Aryas discarded clothing on the floor.

Perhaps their together time could be saved for when one of them isnt buck ass nude. Sansa walked over to the clothes and picked them and her sisters sword up.

"All these years and your still a slob.", Sansa chuckled.

Little did Sansa know, that hidden in the pile of clothing she held in her hands was her little sister, trying to fight her way out from under her shirt so she could scream to her giant sister without it being muffled by the heavy fabric.

Sansa began to walk towards the bed to lay the clothes out which caused a sleeve to slip out and finally give Arya space to move ontop of the pile and hopefully get Sansa to look down at her hands.

Arya looked up at her sister, her face staring straight ahead at her bed, completely oblivious to her plight.

"Sansa!", she screamed.

Sansa stopped in place and quickly scanned the room. That voice sounded like Arya but, like she was far away. No doubt trying to scare her like she had thought.

"Arya? If you approach me without clothes on I'll..."

"Sansa shut up! Look down!"

Arya watched as her big sisters green eyes looked down at her in shock.

Sansa could not believe what she was seeing. Her sister, naked, and so small that she is standing on a shirt that she had draped over her hands.

"A... Arya?"

"Would you shut your trap and put me down before you drop me" she barked up to her, getting Sansa to instantly shut it.

"Oh sorry" she exclaimed and put Arya down on the bed with her clothes pile and crouched down next to it so she could talk to her face to face. She still could not believe the that her sister who was formerly almost up to her shoulder was now the size of the doll her father Ned had given to her all those years ago in Kings Landing, but here she was sitting in a pile of her clothes talking to her as if this was a normal situation.

"So how did this happen? Is it some form of magic? Cause Jon was telling me about the Whites and the Red Priestess..." Sansa trailing into a rant to somehow explain this madness.

"Sansa!, yelled Arya getting her out of her rant and back to the situation at hand. "I don't know how but it was something in the vial, you need to help me get back to normal", said Arya before pausing for a moment,

Sansa thought for a moment, trying not to get distracted by her diminutive sister on the bed next to her. It all came back to her, her maid had mentioned a vial but did not know where it had come from. When asked about it, Sansa thought it was from the Maester because she had asked him previously for milk of the poppy to help her with the stress of being the Lady of Winterfell. She had mixed it with the water she was drinking at the time before coming to check on Arya.

Seeing the face of realization on her gigantic sisters face," You did drink from a vial in your room didn't you?"

But before she could respond, her whole body started to feel odd and tingly. The world started to grow around lady Stark as she started to get smaller. Her formally well fitting and elegant traditional Stark clothing appearing more like thick blankets on her now.

Arya, watching all this unfold yells to her sister, "Quickly get on the bed!"

Sansa, actually listening to her for once climbs on just as her shoes slip off her feet. Her height rapidly falling below two feet, her fear and slight arousement growing with her clothing, all the while Arya watching with fascination as her "big" sister slowly joined her. In a matter of moments, Sansa's head fell into her dress and cloak, disappearing from Arya's view.

"Sansa, are you there", with an air of suspense added to the question by the following silence.

Wishing to ensure that she was alright, Arya clambered out of her pile of clothing and made her way towards her sisters. After some heaving and pushing of the heavy winter cloak, she finally found the once tall and mighty Lady of Winterfell curled up in a ball in the center of her clothing crying. Seeing her sister in such a weakened state brought out sympathy Arya thought had vanished with all her training as a faceless Assassin. She climbed over the dress and started to hug her now similar sized naked sister.

'Hey you clumsy fool stop your river from flowing"

Sansa looking up,"That's suppose to make me feel better?" with doubt in her voice.

"It was worth a try" with a smile spread across her face.

Sansa, remembering their name calling days of old can't help but to smile at the remembrance of the moment. Getting the tears out of her eyes, she decides to stand with her sister, to see when they are next to one another that Sansa is still slightly taller than Arya, if only by less than an inch.

Holding hands" What do we do now?" gets asked Sansa to her wolfblood sister.

"What is it?"

1312.content:
Eddard Stark had gotten into a blur, as his mind was stuck in a state of blind confusion. A sorcerer was performing a show as his family watched on. He had heard the Rains of Castemere, before everything went to this blur. He looked around and saw a good chunk of his family. His son Robb was directly in front of him, his wife Catelyn to his side, his daughters Sansa and Arya to his left. He looked behind to see his son, Rickon, in a similar daze to the rest of the family. As he watched Rickon, a darkness surrounded the confused boy, and a black thing came down on him, crushing him. In horror, Eddard looked up to find the boot of a giant man coming down on his sun. It was a large old man, whom he had seen some times around town, except he was carrying his son, Brandon, on his back, and running away. In the shock and terror, he lead his family with his hands, under a wooden porch. Eventually, Eddard heard more and more of his family in general panic, as Catelyn screamed for Rickon, Robb tried to calm his sisters, and Arya and Sansa seemed to be concerned of their height, or lack there of.

Ned heard a continuous thundering, as he looked to a pair of legs nearing the porch. "Get down!" He ordered his family, and they all laid down in the gigantic mud, as Ned, Robb and Arya raised their swords to whatever was nearing them. A gigantic head poked under the porch, and it was none other than-

13121.content:
The queen's now titanic hand neared the Starks, as Ned, Robb and Arya pressed their respective swords into her hand, causing a stream of blood to exit her appendage.
Ned yelled to his family, "Leave this place!" motioning his clan away as Catelyn and Robb shielded Sansa and Arya, running further into the porch. Ned turned back to find the back of a now angry Cersei's hand, as it crashed into him, shooting him into a porch's post, breaking his back. Cersei got down on her knees to look straight in, where in the heat of the moment, she applied her fist onto Ned, crushing him slowly and painfully, until Arya could take no more, and ran toward Cersei, Needle in hand. Robb, protective of his family, ran after his sister, demanding she halt. Arya rushed into Cersei's exposed breasts and cut them, to the shock of the Lannister. She took her hand off of Ned, leaving a bloody stain, and grabbed Arya with that hand, before soon grabbing Robb with the other.
She stood up and dumped Arya onto Robb, and using her spare hand, disarmed them of their swords. It was then she spoke. "Well, haven't you two done quite the damage," she said, now wiping her bloody hand onto Arya and Robb, prompting struggle from the Stark siblings.
"You may come with me." She dumped the duo into her cleavage and walked away, back to House Lannister.


Arya and Robb awoke on a table, both dazed and confused. They looked into the distance to see a nude Cersei forming in their vision. In her giant form, she wandered over and looked to Arya. She smiled before turning and grabbing the girl's small form and rubbing her inside of her exposed buttcrack. Robb screamed in terror. She then ejected Arya from her behind, and placed her on the table. "That was for my hand."
She grabbed a stool and sat in front of the frenzied Robb, and the dirty grimy and mortified Arya.
"Who wants to get tortured first?"
13121.title: Cersei Lannister

131212.content:
Robb grabs Arya's shoulders and steps between her and Cersei. She smirked at the little Stark, then smacks him with her finger nail, knocking him far up the table.

"Robb!!", Arya screamed.

She began running towards her brother before Cersei plucked her up between her fingers and lifted her high in the air. Cersei held her in front of her face and smiled again.

"Look at you little wolf. Still as wild as ever."

Arya kicked and screamed and clawed at Cerseis fingertips.

"BURN IN HELL YOU BITCH!!! BURN IN HELL!!", she yelled furiously.

"Hm." She chuckled. "Can you stand boy." Her attention now on Robb.

Robb had been struggling to his feet and had only now managed to stand up straight. He turned around and stared up at the giant Lannister with his little sister in her grasp. He wanted to continue defying Cersei, but seeing his baby sister so defensless filled him with fear. Robb knew he couldnt beat Cersei while she could see him, so he needed to fight her another way.

"Please... please dont hurt her." Robb fell to his knees and began begging.

Cerseis grin spread even wider upon seeing that.

"A Stark begging? Its a shame your father isnt here to see this."

Cersei lowered her hand and tossed Arya back onto the table. Arya bounced off her arm and slid aways before stopping. Aside from a dark bruise, she was alright. Robb was only able to hold her for a second before his leg was pinned under Cerseis knuckle, and dragged across the table towards her. Arya started running to Robb but he motioned for her to stop.

Cersei flipped Robb on his back, then tore his pants off him. She then hovered her finger nail over one of his little legs, before viciously digging it in and scraping the skin off. Robb screamed in intense agony as Cersei dragged her nail down his leg, removing flesh like one would remove a scab. Arya could nothing but call out Robbs name and ball her eyes out, because Cersei had grabbed her with her other hand and forced her to watch.

By the time Cersei was done, the skin on the front of Robbs leg was almost completely gone. Replaced with deep red muscle and blood leaking everywhere. Cersei set Arya on top of a large book while Cersei got up to fetch a cloth and alcohol. She arrived then began treating Robbs leg.

"Wouldnt want it over that quickly now would we?", Cersei said to Arya.

She dabbed a cloth into the alcohol, then applied it to Robbs leg. Robb sprung up and howled in pain. Cersei then rubbed the leg clean of all the blood then ripped off a tiny piece from the cloth and tied it tight over Robbs leg.

"There. That should do. I have to go now little wolves. I trust you wont try to run while im away?.....Hm. Lets not take chances."

Cersei scoops Robb into her hand and grabs Arya in her fist. She then walks over to her night stand and sets the Stark siblings on it. She opens a drawer, pulls out a piece of string and ties the two of them together. Then she places them on her dresser and leaves the room.

1543.content:
The thick wooden pole jabbed into my side, nearly throwing me from my feet. It was the size of the largest lance I’d ever seen. No, that is a lie. In reality this mighty lance was little more than a twig being held between the thumb and forefinger of a bored young girl. My current traveling companion, Arya Stark. Was she a giant? No. I was once a knight, traveling my way across the land, trying to avoid this miserable war. Now, I had been reduced to the size of two inches and now relied on her for protection.

JAB. Ouch! She stuck me once more, throwing off my train of thought. She looked at me with a bored expression as she leaned over the tree stump that I was standing on. To her, it was the size of a small stool, to me it could have been the stage in an arena.

“Stop that.” I ordered.

“No,” she said, poking me once more.

“Stop it!” I shouted, my irritation mounting.

“Make me.” She replied, amusement creeping into her voice.

“You know damned well I can’t do that! I’m only two bloody inches tall!”

She shifted her weight and sat down, leaning forward and propping her elbows on either side of me on the stump. She hung her head between her hands. Good lord, even sitting she towered over me. I looked up at her, her mouth nearly directly over me.

“It’s not like it’s my fault. I didn’t do this to you, you’re lucky I found you instead of a wild animal, or some farmer’s bored teenaged daughter.”

She reached the hand holding the stick down and poked me in the side once more. We were in a clearing about a mile from the main road. We’d been traveling since dawn and were both rather hungry, so now we sat trying to decide how we would find something to eat. Or rather I tried to figure it out. The overgrown brat seemed content to try and dent my armor with that infernal log!
I crossed my arms in contempt and looked up at her.

“You are far too big to act this childish.”

“Oh, I’m not big. You’re just rather small.” Arya said with a smirk. “You’re quite the opposite of my last companion. He towered over me.”

“That doesn’t matter now, we need to find some food and shelter before nightfall. It’s getting colder.”

Arya stood up and walked over to our pack that lay on the ground a few feet away. She reached into it and pulled out a large coat she had bartered off of a trader. She put it on and it reached down to nearly her knees. We’d decided that this would aid in disguising the fact that she was a girl. The coat also had a collar that could pull up to help shield her from the wind. Once she had the coat on, she turned to me.

“We could stay outside tonight, between this and my blankets, I’ll be warm. And you can sleep in the pack.”

“Maybe, but then what would we do about food?”

A sly grin slowly crept across Arya’s face. She crept towards me looking ever more mischievous.

“You know, I am of The North. My mother told me stories of the last winter.” Arya hovered over me, lowering her face towards me as she spoke. “When the food was gone and the cold nights stretched on. She said that eventually they had to turn to eating livestock, and eventually…” Her mouth was only inches away from me at this point. “They had to eat each other. Starting with the smallest.” As she said that, her tongue flicked from her mouth and slammed into my chest in a short but strong lick, knocking me to my feet.

I wiped her drool from my armor, thankful that my face was spared. I stood and looked up to her. Her face was still hovering in front of me, now wearing a self-satisfied grin.

“I vote that we avoid cannibalism. I say we go on down the road a bit further to see if we could come across a tavern or a farm.”

Arya stood with a sigh, walked over to the pack, hoisted it to her shoulder and walked back. She lowered her hand palm up towards me.

“And by we walk, you mean me.”

“Of course,” I replied, climbing to her palm. “Would you have it any other way?”

She sat me on her shoulder as she started walking towards the road.

“Honestly, I’d rather trade you to a horny farm girl for a horse.”

We walked along the road until nightfall. Did we find anywhere to stay or were we forced to sleep outdoors?

info.description:
I was surprised that there was no Game of Thrones size interactive on this site already, so I decided to rectify that.

This is basically what it says on the tin. A Game of Thrones size changing interactive. Have you ever wanted to see a giantess Daenerys Targaryen crush a city beneath her as she continues her conquest? Go for it. Have you ever wanted to see Cersei Lannister pleasure herself with a shrunken foe, or see her shrunk and toyed with by a foe? Have at it. Get as sexual or violent as you want. Have a ball.

First, a few ground rules.
#1. Keep it to the show. For now, lets just try to draw from characters and events already introduced in the show. This seems fair since not everyone has read the books

#2. I’m good with almost anything sexual. Giantess, giants, shrunken people, couples. I personally prefer women over men, but I know Thrones has a large and diverse fan base and I don’t want anyone to be excluded.

#3. No sexual content with under-aged characters. You can have stuff in the story featuring characters like Arya, but don’t do anything pedophilic. If a person’s actor is of age, like Joffrey’s, then that is fine.

#4. Try and keep the chapters of a somewhat decent length and NO text speak.

#5. Always leave an option open. Don’t just end it for everyone else.

I doubt I’ll delete much, and I won’t edit unless it’s to touch up something here or there.

Other than that, have fun. All size related fetishes are allowed. There is no size limit. Get as big or as small as you want.
